NAME info-map
DLG ITM_0

ITM 1
00001000
00010000

00110100
00000000
NAME info_log
DLG ITM_1

DLG ITM_0
You immediately recognise the simple shapes - they're the mountains, the rivers of the surrounding valley. Whatever positioning system the old girl had is still clearly functioning.

DLG ITM_1
"""
The log is corrupt, damaged. A scant few entries persist, and out of those (including technical readouts,
position updates, comm interception) only a handful are of use to you.
"""

DLG SPR_0
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}(1/5) welcome USER to the PALLECO MECHWORKS "imoda-v2"
    this ABOUT page will provide relevant information to current system conditions{clr2}
  - {clr2}(2/5) STATUS
    engine - OFFLINE
    gyrostabs - PARTIAL
    life support - PARTIAL
    dsksys_console - ONLINE
    posit_xyz - ONLINE
    heatdump mgmt - OFFLINE
    blkbox_log - PARTIAL{clr2}
  - {clr2}(3/5)STATUS_2
    CORE A - PASS
    CORE B - FAIL
    CORE C - FAIL{clr2}
  - {clr2}(4/5) WARNING
    SUBSTANTIAL system failure detected
    please contact nearest PALLECO MECHWORKS technician for assistant // prevention of long-term structure instability{clr2}
  - {clr2}(5/5) THANK YOU for completing this system update{clr2}
  - There is nothing more to read...
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}pos_xyz (249.43, 32.43, -323.33)
    velo (0)
    dd{clr2}
  - 
}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}pos_xyz (249.43, 32.43, -323.33)
    velo(0){clr2}
  - {clr2}notes: "Evening. I've made it past the Baroevi Shelf, the worst of the sandstorm is behind us. Moda ain't holding up too well, though.{clr2}
  - The pilot seems to have been clearing a storm. You noticed a great wind blow through a few days back, but the Sandsea's still a good day or two away by foot.
}
"""

DLG SPR_3
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}structure_ping (12##)
    dist_est, 4.5km{clr2}
  - {clr2}notes: "Looks like a small garage on the scanners. stabs are on the fritz - will have to abandon ship. Parts possible.
     won't be gone long."{clr2}
  - That explains why the cockpit is empty, then. Pilot left for repairs. You recall seeing a small shack on the way here, but it was empty. Seemed to have been for weeks.
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
"""
{clr2}PING-12:
Note: "Large, skeletal structure. Climbing the height of the cliff-side. Unaware of any beast that could leave remains that size"{clr2}
"""

DLG SPR_5
"""
{clr2}PING-08
notes: "strange, localised clear in the storm near Paal Gulch. Eye of the storm not projected for another 18 hours"{clr2}
"""

DLG SPR_6
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}log_37:
    "Ran into another drifter out the sea, west of Lorei. An old Bulwark-Pattern - from the north, then, I figure."{clr2}
  - {clr2}"Lady doesn't give me her name, but she's swathed in red cloaks. Part of the 'guard up there,
    then. We trade oil for water -
    I've got one, she's got the other"{clr2}
  - {clr2}"We camp, the night. Tells me about the fall, up there, years back. Know the story well enough,
    but how often do you meet someone who's still living with that calamity?" {clr2}
  - The log ends. There's an audio file attached - a thirteen-string plays, but the words underneath are fuzzy, corrupted.
}
"""

DLG SPR_7
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}COMMS_LOG_11
    "Look. I need you to listen to me for once in your damn life."
    {clr2}
  - {clr1}"And I told you that I don't need this right now. I don't have the TIME to pack up and go, just like that.
    Just like -you-"{clr1}
  - {clr2}"Don't be like that. This is --important-, something's stirred out there, somethi--"{clr2}
  - The communication is badly distorted. This is all you can make out.
}
"""

DLG SPR_8
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}Log_07:
    "I've been out here about... one, two months now? It's been pretty dull so far - it's a survey job, was hoping for something to, y'know, survey"{clr2}
  - {clr2}"Stumbled across a chasm earlier today, though. Something wild going on down there, sent the sensors haywire. Plan to make a return trip, with proper equipment."{clr2}
  - {clr2}"Strange thing, though. Deeper I got, the more screwed my readouts. Kept telling me date/time was centuries off. Location, too - though none of the coordinates read like anything I've ever seen."{clr2}
  - The log ends, as does the Pilot's tale of the chasm.
}
"""

DLG SPR_9
"""
{sequence
  - {clr2}Log_67:
    "Sandstorm hit days before expected. Real danger it's too late to reach the shelf. Deflectors lost 3 days ago, this is... it ain't gonna be fun."{clr2}
  - {clr2}"Thing is, old mechs like this, they don't handle the big storms too well. Grit gets in all the small parts, shreds 'em."{clr2}
  - {clr2}"We've got through worse, though? I think. I like to hope, at least. This data's too important to lose, this could be a real game-changer."{clr2}
  - The log cuts there. Evidently, from the crumpled wreck around you, the mech didn't make it.
}
"""

END 0


END undefined
Shutting Down...

VAR a
42
